externalandinternalstackholdertraning.breadCrumb: TRANING  /   EXTERNAL AND INTERNAL STAKEHOLDER TRAINING

contents.content: This communications pack has been meticulously crafted to equip LOC communicators/marketers with the necessary tools to respond effectively to external stakeholder inquiries regarding counterfeit issues concerning our products in Vietnam. The messaging contained within this document is designed to maintain consistency and clarity in communications with various stakeholders, including customers, consumers, healthcare professionals, and regulators. It is imperative that the provided messaging is adhered to without deviation. Any additional messaging deemed necessary must undergo approval from global and Area authorities.
These materials have been developed collaboratively in partnership with key stakeholders across functions, ensuring alignment and coherence in our approach to addressing counterfeit concerns.
Technology Adoption:

list-items: Messages for social media and corporate website
